name: ngx-barcode-scanner-demo

scripts.release-alpha: npm run lint && npm run test && npm --prefix projects/ngx-barcode-scanner run release -- --prerelease alpha
scripts.release-patch: npm run lint && npm run test && npm --prefix projects/ngx-barcode-scanner run release -- --release-as patch
scripts.release-minor: npm run lint && npm run test && npm --prefix projects/ngx-barcode-scanner run release -- --release-as minor
scripts.release-major: npm run lint && npm run test && npm --prefix projects/ngx-barcode-scanner run release -- --release-as major
scripts.build-prod: npm run lint && npm run test && ng build ngx-barcode-scanner --configuration production  && cp README.md dist/ngx-barcode-scanner/README.md
scripts.publish: npm run build-prod && cd dist/ngx-barcode-scanner && npm publish --access public

description: Angular12+ barcode scanner component using Quagga
author: Eisberg Labs
